column1: Smoque BBQ////Overall though... it wasn't anything we'd rave about and probably wouldn't go out of our way to revisit Smoque if we were in town again.  For us
column2: we don't know how Smoque has such raving yelp reviews.  Maybe it's really good BBQ for Chicago... but I know for my bf
column3: he's had the best BBQ ribs at Phil's in San Diego
column4: CA and Dinosaur in NYC.  But Smoque in Chicago just didn't seem to compare.
